titleStmt.title: Leiden, Bibliotheek der, Vossius Germ. Gall. Q 4

msItem.title: Magna carta with statutes, in Anglo-French

history.provenance: Provenance: Isaac Vossius (d. 1689); sold in 1690 to Rijksuniversiteit Leiden.

listBibl.bibl: Bibliography: J. P. Gumbert, ‘Medieval Manuscripts in French in the Leiden University Library: A Handlist', in P. R. Monks and D. D. R. Owen, eds., Medieval Codicology, Iconography, Literature, and Translation (Leiden, 1994), p. 38.

body.p:
Leiden, Bibliotheek der Rijksuniversiteit
Vossius Germ. Gall. Q 4. Magna carta with statutes, in Anglo-French.76 ff. 229 x 163 mm. Text block 173 x 155 mm.
Provenance: Isaac Vossius (d. 1689); sold in 1690 to Rijksuniversiteit Leiden.
Bibliography: J. P. Gumbert, ‘Medieval Manuscripts in French in the Leiden University Library: A Handlist', in P. R. Monks and D. D. R. Owen, eds., Medieval Codicology, Iconography, Literature, and Translation (Leiden, 1994), p. 38.
